EmailTemplate.name: 2011_VNS_Rotation_Email1
EmailTemplate.subject: VisiCAD Rotation Provider Product Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Product Demonstration VisiCAD Rotation Provider
Join Customer Account Managers Ken Schulte and Sally Olson-Nelson and Product Specialist James Howard for a Product Demonstration of VisiCAD's Rotation Provider Module.
New in VisiCAD Version 5, the Rotation Provider module provides the ability to track and request resources/services not directly associated with your agency and that are used on a rotational basis, such a towing services, ambulance transport, locksmith, etc. The Rotation Provider module simplifies the automation, tracking and rotation of services through VisiCAD to increase coordination and efficiency between Dispatch, designated public safety agencies and local support services involved in a single incident.
Webinar: Wednesday, August 24 10 am PT l 12 noon CT l 1 pm ET
*If you cannot view the "Register Now" button above, please copy and paste the URL into any internet browser to Register: http://tritech.ilinc.com/register/mymmwbb
﻿
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
